description: This file is a BitBake include (.inc) recipe that defines how to build and configure the Bluez 5.48 Linux Bluetooth stack userland components. It specifies dependencies, configuration options, patches, installation procedures, and related metadata needed for building the package within Yocto or similar build systems.

methods.name: get_noinst_tools_paths
methods.description: A helper function to generate paths for non-instrumented tools based on the 'NOINST_TOOLS' variable.
